website_summaries.verdict: Apple's subtly improved watch adds a key overdue feature and improved software with this update, but it remains largely the same great smartwatch as last year.
pros: The Apple Watch Series 5 adds an always-on display, so it can show the time all the time
An added compass aids navigation and improves elevation readings
Cellular models gain an international SOS mode
cons: Battery life remains a day and a half at best
No new health features, and the watch lacks native sleep tracking
Needs an iPhone to set up and work
Offers only Apple's growing but limited selection of watch faces

customer_reviews.title: Missing display
customer_reviews.text: It came without the display! Someone stole it at the distributing Location or where ever it came from! This was supposed to be a Christmas gift for my wife. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Gaitan

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my wife after she was jealous of mine...she was apprehensive about it being worth the money, battery life, etc...the typical complaint you read about. Well, she loves it. Battery life? Just put it in the charger in the morning while you get ready for work or whatever, and it’s charged. I’ve gone two days to see how far to push it but I always take it off to shower anyway; why not charge it? Anyway, she has discovered and is still discovering it’s many conveniences and as I said, loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Buck Dashe

customer_reviews.title: I Phone 6 “S” is Needed, Not just a 6
customer_reviews.text: I can’t wait to use it. I bought it with the understanding that it would be compatible with my IPhone 6. An IPhone 6S is actually needed. I now have a new phone on order.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Glad I have an Apple Watch now! Happy customer here!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my watch! Battery life is fine. I’m used to having to charge my phone every other night so charging the watch every night or every other is no big deal to me. It’s fun having all the different apps to try out. I could cut out having it tell me to breathe. I’ve been doing just fine without the reminder and haven’t dropped yet!! Otherwise, No worries here!!
customer_reviews.author: Tresa Standrich

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! Came well package everything in tack and functions perfectly! Comes with charger and an extra wrist brand one looks like it’s for a bigger writs and the other is a bit smaller I’m a female with a fairly small wrist and thought the 44mm would be too big but it’s perfect size and I’m happy I didn’t get it any smaller! However I haven’t had it long enough to review the the battery life it just came in the mail but other than that buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Love love the Series 5, 44mm!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my new Series 5, 44mm! I upgraded from the Series 3, 42mm wanting some upgraded features including battery, faster processor, awesome speaker sound and most of all a larger screen so I don’t have to strain my eyes. I wasn’t quite sure how the 44mm would feel and look considering I’m a petite female but I’m so glad I didn’t second guess myself. Love love the bigger screen! If you are thinking about upgrading from the Series 3, you will NOT be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite piece of tech
customer_reviews.text: My first smartwatch and I’m very happy with it. Very easy to configure. Bought it for walking tracking but using it for so much more. From viewing msgs, notifications, etc without picking up the phone (yes I’m the kind of person that if it rings I have to look) to wallet paying with phone in the pocket. Still dont know what took me so long to make the investment. One complaint: Battery life can be better. If you like classic watch look go with the 40mm, if you are like me who likes them bulky the 44mm it is.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Molina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome as a Sports Watch to support my running goals.
customer_reviews.text: The Apple Watch Series 5 is my first Apple Watch, and I absolutely 😍 it!! I got with The sports band and it fits really really well. The band is smooth and feels great against the skin. I bought it specifically to use as a Sports Watch along with Nike Run Club App, to support my running goals. After my first test paired with AirPods 2, the results have been VERY inspiring!!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s an apple product. It’s user friendly as expected. I usually use a Fitbit but decided to get the watch. Compared to Fitbit I think it’s over priced and the battery power is weak (compared to Fitbit again). I’m not even sure if it has a sleep tracker because I’m usually charging it at night. It might last a day and a half if you’re not using it. But what good is a watch this price if you’re not using it. It does have some cool features tho which is it’s only saving grace. It’s like a small phone on your wrist so it can be a good accessory to the iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: i dont have take my phone out anymore from my pocket
customer_reviews.text: my first apple watch purchase. it's convenient for me in my blue collar work setting. 🛠⛓⚒⚙️🧰🔧🔩. worth it
customer_reviews.author: shoei_ryder

customer_reviews.title: Always on display is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love the always on display on the watch. I went from series 2 to this so it was a huge upgrade. It works well for fitness tracking and displaying messages without having to pull out your phone. The huge accessory market makes it easy to change the look of your watch with cases and bands. If you don’t have one and love apple products this is a great device for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My second Watch
customer_reviews.text: My series one screen fell off after a workout and I was desperate for a new one since I was traveling for a week. Can’t live without my data! So I ordered online after I had done research over Xmas, ordered for delivery to a locker near my hotel and voila! Hours later I had my blessed watch. Within 10 minutes I had it live with all my data, having always backed up to the cloud. Love the OS, love the quick access.
customer_reviews.author: Potentiate

customer_reviews.title: You should know
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice upgrade from a series 3 38mm Apple Watch I love the bigger screen it’s just that battery life blows with the always on screen if you turn that feature off you get a little longer but still not as good as my old series 3 38mm watch was I usually got two days before charging now I have to charge every night when I sleep so no sleep tracking for me
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Wiener

customer_reviews.title: The white band seems to get dirty
customer_reviews.text: I think getting the black band is the way to go, since it hides dirt. The white band on this watch doens't stay pristine long. It is like wearing a new pair of white shoes, they look good in the store, but aren't practicle. I don't think this watch will ever be able to clean up to its original color. Bottom line... there are better watches and Apple has gone down hill in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal! 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻
customer_reviews.text: This is a REALLY good deal! I’m already used to the watch because I have the Series 3 as well, but this 5 one is unbelievable! I just didn’t like that Amazon left it on my door without my signature.
customer_reviews.author: ADAM

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Apple 5! I never thought I needed one until I got one. Now I can remember how I managed without it! I use it for organization and workouts. The lap swim feature is amazing. It is in my opinion, steeply priced, but I love it. The battery on this watch lasts all day. It does need to be charged overnight.
customer_reviews.author: loves to teach

customer_reviews.title: Life changer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad. I wanted to track his heart a little bit. I was worried he wouldn't use it since he is a traditional guy, not so in love with technology. He has not worn any of his beautiful watches since I gave this watch to him last Christmas. I almost feel bad for them. :)
customer_reviews.author: Omar Chamorro

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave home without it
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is an issue but answering calls while my iPhone is in another room is a big plus and quite an improvement over the iWatch4. Still, the price is difficult to swallow when compared to many smart watches selling for less than $100
customer_reviews.author: JoeC

customer_reviews.title: Confused?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a used Apple Watch 5, I received everything but the actual Apple Watch face. I was super confused, I thought I accidentally purchased one of those “box only” scams but no it looks like someone forgot to put the watch back when doing quality control maybe
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Bigger screen 44mm
customer_reviews.text: I had the 38mm, gave it away as a gift For me the 38mm was more a women’s fit. So got this 44mm & so glad I did, the screen size made a big difference on viewing it.
customer_reviews.author: Wright

customer_reviews.title: The EKG is accurate.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is great. I’m only 31 years old and recently went into AFIB. My Apple Watch alerted me and I went to the Emergency department. It was accurate. The 12 lead EKG confirmed I was in AFIB and I was able to get the treatment I needed. Be reminded, the watch does NOT check for heart attacks though. It also has many other great features for exercise, weather, reminders, etc. I wouldn’t wear any other watch.
customer_reviews.author: Mattrthomas8

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t know I needed it until I had it.
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of fishing my phone out of my pocket all the time. I like that time never goes away, and that I can control things from my wrist, like alarms, timers, music, etc., not to mention the ability to easily respond to texts.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Starns

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great. Only thing I had to do was flip the buttons to be on the left after accidentally resetting my watch two days in a row while working out.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Love my watch
customer_reviews.text: Traded up from my Fitbit, I love this watch. I probably don’t use half the features. My only complaint is the battery life, I charge it every night. By mid day I’m at 60% so it’s just easier to charge while I’m sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi DeBauche

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I’ve had it for about 3 months. I wear it for about 23 hours a day, charging is quick and when I charge I still have around 53-48%. It came sealed in an apple box, everything included. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I had the series 1 for a long time (very outdated) and also a Fitbit Versa but neither compare to this watch! I love how sleek this watch is. I got the Series 5 44mm and I’m so glad I did! I read the review about having smaller wrist/the watch still fitting well and it convinced me to go with the bigger version!
customer_reviews.author: BRicht20

customer_reviews.title: 100% authentic
customer_reviews.text: if your an apple fan here it is: INTRODUCING THE GREATEST AND THE MOST USELESS APPLE PRODUCT. but if you have a budget yea definitely lol! great product. If you’re thinking if it’s 100% authentic, YES!
customer_reviews.author: Nelvyn Esposo

customer_reviews.title: My new modern surf watch
customer_reviews.text: Sleek and modern watch that i bring out surfing. The dial and passive on screen is very sleek. Battery life is decent but I don’t track my sleep, so I don’t mind charging it every night along with my phone.

customer_reviews.title: Battery life about 12 to 14 hours
customer_reviews.text: The only dissatisfaction is the battery life. I love everything else. Positive the Calls are very clear.

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: This watch is legitimately amazing this is a must buy for everyone to always on display is spectacular however when I am doing one of my custom live photo watch faces I have to turn off the always on display that’s the only con but otherwise it’s still good.

I have to say that I try to use it for everything, alarms, music, Spotify, running, weather, news, uber, etc. If you like the use of tech and able to pair with many gadgets it is an excellent product.

While the band is white and rubber and probably prone to getting dirty, the fact that you can buy an interchangeable band on Amazon for around ~10-15 makes it an easy choice. Great gift for any athlete or anyone who's into wearable tech.

product_meta.title: Apple Watch Series 5 (GPS, 44mm) - Silver Aluminum Case with White Sport Band
